Component.Name: Messenger
Component.Description: Handles communication between CDP objects, components and applications.

Signal.Name: UDPNetworkLoad
Signal.Description: Messenger network load, sum of in and out.

Signal.Name: UDPHighSendBufferTop
Signal.Description: UDP message buffer top, high priority.

Signal.Name: UDPSendFailures
Signal.Description: UDP message send failures last minute.

Signal.Name: UDPSendRetryCount
Signal.Description: UDP message send retry count last minute.

Signal.Name: UDPSendBlockingTime
Signal.Description: Max UDP send block time (application debug level must be at least 1 to be measured).

Signal.Name: UDPSendMaxBlockingTime
Signal.Description: Filtered max UDP send block time (application debug level must be at least 1 to be measured).

Parameter.Name: kMonitorFilter
Parameter.Description: IIR filter constant 0..1 for monitor signal filtering. 1 == filter disabled.

Parameter.Name: Max retry count
Parameter.Description: Maximum UDP send retry count for a message.

Parameter.Name: Network disabled
Parameter.Description: Set == 1 to disable messenger network send and isolate this application from the network.

Timer.Name: TimerInitTimeout
Timer.Description: Timer used for state-transition from Init to Running.

Timer.Name: TimerSendNotify
Timer.Description: Timer used to decide how often to send notify messages.

Timer.Name: StatisticsSignalsUpdateRate
Timer.Description: Timer used to decide how often to update statistics signals.

Timer.Name: FailureSignalsUpdateRate
Timer.Description: Timer used to decide how often to update failure signals.
